member.name: T:UniverseLib.Config.ConfigManager
member.summary: Contains properties used by UniverseLib to act as a "config", although it is not really a full config implementation. Changing property values in this class has a direct and immediate effect on UniverseLib.

member.name: M:UniverseLib.Config.ConfigManager.LoadConfig(UniverseLib.Config.UniverseLibConfig)
member.summary: Applies the values from the provided which are not null.

member.name: P:UniverseLib.Config.ConfigManager.Disable_EventSystem_Override
member.summary: If true, disables UniverseLib from overriding the EventSystem from the game when a UniversalUI is in use.

member.name: P:UniverseLib.Config.ConfigManager.Force_Unlock_Mouse
member.summary: If true, attempts to force-unlock the mouse () when a UniversalUI is in use.

member.name: P:UniverseLib.Config.ConfigManager.Unhollowed_Modules_Folder
member.summary: For IL2CPP games, this should be the full path to a folder containing the Unhollowed assemblies. This property is only used during the intial startup process.

member.name: F:UniverseLib.Config.UniverseLibConfig.Disable_EventSystem_Override
member.summary: If true, disables UniverseLib from overriding the EventSystem from the game when a UniversalUI is in use.

member.name: F:UniverseLib.Config.UniverseLibConfig.Force_Unlock_Mouse
member.summary: If true, attempts to force-unlock the mouse () when a UniversalUI is in use.

member.name: F:UniverseLib.Config.UniverseLibConfig.Unhollowed_Modules_Folder
member.summary: For IL2CPP games, this should be the full path to a folder containing the Unhollowed assemblies.

member.name: T:UniverseLib.Input.CursorUnlocker
member.summary: Handles taking control of the mouse/cursor and EventSystem (depending on Config settings) when a UniversalUI is being used.

member.name: P:UniverseLib.Input.CursorUnlocker.ShouldUnlock
member.summary: True if a UI is being displayed and is true.

member.name: P:UniverseLib.Input.CursorUnlocker.CurrentEventSystem
member.summary: The value of "EventSystem.current", or "EventSystem.main" in some older games.

member.name: M:UniverseLib.Input.CursorUnlocker.UnlockCoroutine
member.summary: Uses WaitForEndOfFrame in a Coroutine to aggressively set the Cursor state every frame.

member.name: M:UniverseLib.Input.CursorUnlocker.UpdateCursorControl
member.summary: Checks current ShouldUnlock state and sets the Cursor and EventSystem as required.

member.name: M:UniverseLib.Input.CursorUnlocker.EnableEventSystem
member.summary: If the UniverseLib EventSystem is not enabled, this enables it and sets EventSystem.current to it, and stores the previous EventSystem.

member.name: M:UniverseLib.Input.CursorUnlocker.ReleaseEventSystem
member.summary: If the UniverseLib EventSystem is enabled, this disables it and sets EventSystem.current to the previous EventSystem which was enabled.

member.name: T:UniverseLib.Input.IHandleInput
member.summary: Interface for handling Unity Input API.

member.name: T:UniverseLib.Input.InputManager
member.summary: A universal Input handler which works with both legacy Input and the new InputSystem.

member.name: P:UniverseLib.Input.InputManager.CurrentType
member.summary: The current Input package which is being used by the game.

member.name: P:UniverseLib.Input.InputManager.MousePosition
member.summary: The current user Cursor position, with (0,0) being the bottom-left of the game display window.

member.name: P:UniverseLib.Input.InputManager.MouseScrollDelta
member.summary: The current mouse scroll delta from this frame. x is horizontal, y is vertical.

member.name: M:UniverseLib.Input.InputManager.GetKeyDown(UnityEngine.KeyCode)
member.summary: Returns true if the provided KeyCode was pressed this frame. Translates KeyCodes into Key if InputSystem is being used.

member.name: M:UniverseLib.Input.InputManager.GetKey(UnityEngine.KeyCode)
member.summary: Returns true if the provided KeyCode is being held down (not necessarily just pressed). Translates KeyCodes into Key if InputSystem is being used.

member.name: M:UniverseLib.Input.InputManager.GetMouseButtonDown(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns true if the provided mouse button was pressed this frame. 0 is left click, 1 is right button, 2 is middle button, etc.

member.name: M:UniverseLib.Input.InputManager.GetMouseButton(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns true if the provided mouse button is being held down (not necessarily just pressed). 0 is left click, 1 is right button, 2 is middle button, etc.

member.name: P:UniverseLib.Input.InputManager.UIInput
member.summary: The current BaseInputModule being used for the UI.

member.name: P:UniverseLib.Input.InputManager.Rebinding
member.summary: Whether anything is currently using the Rebinding feature.

member.name: P:UniverseLib.Input.InputManager.LastRebindKey
member.summary: The last pressed Key during rebinding.

member.name: M:UniverseLib.Input.InputManager.BeginRebind(System.Action{UnityEngine.KeyCode},System.Action{System.Nullable{UnityEngine.KeyCode}})
member.summary: Begins the Rebinding process, keys pressed will be recorded. Call to finish rebinding.
member.param: Will be invoked whenever any key is pressed, even if rebinding has not finished yet.
Invoked when EndRebind is called.

member.name: M:UniverseLib.Input.InputManager.EndRebind
member.summary: Call this to finish Rebinding. The onFinished Action supplied to will be invoked if we are currently Rebinding.

member.name: M:UniverseLib.UI.UIFactory.CreateSliderScrollbar(UnityEngine.GameObject,UnityEngine.UI.Slider@)
member.summary:
Create a SliderScrollbar, using a Slider to mimic a Scrollbar. This fixes several issues with Unity's Scrollbar implementation.
Note that this will not have any actual functionality. Use this along with an to automate the functionality.
member.param: The parent to create on to.
Your created Slider component
member.returns: The root GameObject for your SliderScrollbar.

The background color, defaults to grey.
member.returns: The root GameObject for your ScrollView.

A wrapper for a scrollable InputField created with .

member.summary: Invoked whenever this InputField is scrolled through (ie,

member.name: T:UniverseLib.UI.Widgets.ScrollView.DataHeightCache`1
member.summary:
Used to handle the underlying height data for a scroll pool, tracking which data values are at which position and how far they span.
A DataHeightCache is created and managed automatically by a ScrollPool, you do not need to use this class yourself.

member.name: F:UniverseLib.UI.Widgets.ScrollView.DataHeightCache`1.rangeCache
member.summary:
Lookup table for "which data index first appears at this position"
Index: DefaultHeight * index from top of data
Value: the first data index at this position

member.name: M:UniverseLib.UI.Widgets.ScrollView.DataHeightCache`1.GetRangeCeilingOfPosition(System.Single)
member.summary: Same as GetRangeIndexOfPosition, except this rounds up to the next division if there was remainder from the previous cell.

member.name: M:UniverseLib.UI.Widgets.ScrollView.DataHeightCache`1.GetRangeFloorOfPosition(System.Single)
member.summary: Get the first range (division of DefaultHeight) which the position appears in.

member.name: M:UniverseLib.UI.Widgets.ScrollView.DataHeightCache`1.GetRangeSpread(System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary:
Get the spread of the height, starting from the start position.
The "spread" begins at the start of the next interval of the DefaultHeight, then increases for every interval beyond that.

member.name: M:UniverseLib.UI.Widgets.ScrollView.DataHeightCache`1.Add(System.Single)
member.summary: Append a data index to the cache with the provided height value.

member.name: M:UniverseLib.UI.Widgets.ScrollView.DataHeightCache`1.RemoveLast
member.summary: Remove the last (highest count) index from the height cache.

member.name: M:UniverseLib.UI.Widgets.ScrollView.DataHeightCache`1.SetIndex(System.Int32,System.Single)
member.summary: Set a given data index with the specified value.

member.name: P:UniverseLib.Universe.Context
member.summary: The current runtime context (Mono or IL2CPP).

member.name: P:UniverseLib.Universe.CurrentGlobalState
member.summary: The current setup state of UniverseLib.

member.name: M:UniverseLib.Universe.Init(System.Action,System.Action{System.String,UnityEngine.LogType})
member.summary: Initialize UniverseLib with default settings, if you don't require any finer control over the startup process.
member.param: Invoked after the startupDelayand after UniverseLib has finished initializing.

Should be used for printing UniverseLib's own internal logs. Your listener will only be used if no listener has yet been provided to handle it. It is not required to implement this but it may be useful to diagnose internal errors.

member.name: M:UniverseLib.Universe.Init(System.Single,System.Action,System.Action{System.String,UnityEngine.LogType},UniverseLib.Config.UniverseLibConfig)
member.summary: Initialize UniverseLib with the provided parameters.
member.param: Will be used only if it is the highest value supplied to this method compared to other assemblies. If another assembly calls this Init method with a higher startupDelay, their value will be used instead.
Invoked after the and after UniverseLib has finished initializing.

Should be used for printing UniverseLib's own internal logs. Your listener will only be used if no listener has yet been provided to handle it. It is not required to implement this but it may be useful to diagnose internal errors.
Can be used to set certain values of UniverseLib's configuration. Null config values will be ignored.
